cit:name.gco:CharacterString: Website of the Australian Ocean Data Network (AODN)

cit:description.gco:CharacterString: Point of truth URL of this metadata record

cit:name.gco:CharacterString: Climate Change Research Centre (CCRC), The University of New South Wales (UNSW)

mri:abstract.gco:CharacterString: This dataset contains the reconstructed time series of monthly mean aragonite, calcite and pH together with distribution of dissolved inorganic carbon (DIC), total alkalinity (ALK), sea surface temperature and salinity in the Australian region at a 1 degree resolution over the period 1870-2013.

mri:credit.gco:CharacterString: Integrated Marine Observing System (IMOS) for providing data from their Australian National Reference Stations (NRS)
Kate Berry and Kristina Patterson for their analysis of the observed carbon data

cit:name.gco:CharacterString: Website of the Australian Ocean Data Network (AODN)

cit:description.gco:CharacterString: Mole concentration of dissolved inorganic carbon (DIC) - WMS layer
Sea water pH (total scale) - WMS layer
The GoGoDuck subsets and aggregates gridded data. Data is returned as a NetCDF file

mrl:statement.gco:CharacterString:
This dataset was created using both observed and modelled data.
A full description of the dataset is available from: "Historical reconstruction of ocean acidification in the Australian region. Lenton et al. 2016, Biogeosciences 13, 1753-1765,http://www.biogeosciences.net/13/1753/2016
